import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./stylesheet.css';import{Form,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChildRegistrationForm=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[formData,setFormData]=useState({firstName:'',lastName:'',age:'',gender:'male',immunizations:'BCG'});const handleInputChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value.toUpperCase()});};const handleFormSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();// Validate form data
